Security Policy

Supported Versions

The following versions get support for security updates.

Version Supported
1.2.x :white_check_mark:
1.1.x :x:
1.0.x :white_check_mark:
< 1.0 :x:

Reporting a Vulnerability

To report any found vulnerabilities, open an issue on GitHub. When an issue to an invulnerability gets accepted, you will get first DMed and then the issue will change status from "Confirming" to "Pending". If the invulnerability gets rejected the status changes from "Confirming" to "Rejected".
